summary: Archer focused follower available in UNP, CBBE, and SeveNBase; With and Without Armor; Optimized and Uncompressed skin options.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#6aa84f][size=6][b][u]Emerald[/u][/b][/size][/color][/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/o1m8a12mf/EmeraldTitleImage.png[/img]

Based on The World of RipX's Character on his [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCs6RGhIXb1FfZOjntqs7jzg]YouTube channel[/url].
Permission granted for follower creation by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/24998734/?]The World of RipX[/url][font=Verdana].[/font]

[font=Verdana][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/tefo1wfwn/Story.png[/img]
[/font][color=#b6d7a8][i][font=Verdana]Emerald looks around, beholden of herself. She is amazed at what has happened to her, and is contemplating her new power. She has beautiful emerald armor, a stunning emerald bow and arrows…Her physical change is noted by the transformation of her body, along with her new green eyes and hair… and as she stands here, on the cusp of potential greatness, she finds it difficult to remember the past…
[/font][/i]
[/color][font=Verdana][color=#b6d7a8][i]She was once Rolaryn, a carefree half elf ranger living in the city of Kelethin on the planet of Norrath. She was a good archer but was still nowhere near where she wanted to be, in terms of skill and ability. It was a sad day when Kelethin was attacked by orcs. With the destruction of the city eminent, a village mage opened a portal with the hope of porting Rolaryn to the distant city of Felwithe. However, the mage was killed halfway through the incantation and Rolaryn was thrown into time and space, ending up…in Skyrim.

[/i][/color][/font][font=Verdana][color=#b6d7a8][i]A year has passed since then. Rolaryn hunted and became stronger. She assimilated into the wood elves culture and lived among them…but something was missing. She did not feel the sense of belonging as she did in Kelethin with her elven brothers and sisters. She had an empty space in her heart and soul, which she tried to fill with countless endeavors. Lately countless battles, each one more dangerous, became the norm. Rolaryn didn’t care about her own life anymore; life had become so…worthless to her. Life threatening battle was the one thing that made her feel alive.

[/i][/color][/font][font=Verdana][i][color=#b6d7a8]She remembers the day where everything changed. The way she jumped into that group of vampires so recklessly and just went mad with anger. Soon the tide turned and she was overwhelmed. She thought of her home world one last time as the killing blow came down…

[/color][/i][i][color=#b6d7a8]She remembers the burst of fire, and the screaming of vampires. She watched as the vampires were destroyed in explosions of flame. She remembers the girl, dressed in fire, with the red sword that cut through the vampires like they were nothing. She remembers that evil and yet fulfilled look in those eyes…and she remembered those eyes...those deep, brooding, red eyes.

[/color][/i][i][color=#b6d7a8]She remembered when the mysterious girl outstretched her hand and took Rolaryn’s. She remembered how she offered Rolaryn the ultimate gift… new power to dwarf anything she could have ever thought of reaching in this life. The chance to be the best archer ever, stronger and quicker than anyone ever had been. But, more than anything else, the chance to be part of a family again. In return, Rolaryn would stand and fight by her side from then onward. As Rolaryn bowed before her in acceptance and surrender, the mysterious girls eyes glistened as her lips formed a sinister smile; as she put her hand on Rolaryn’s head, she simply whispered into Rolaryn’s ear, “Every Ruby needs an Emerald.”

[/color][/i][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/jiel29a4n/Info.png[/img]
[size=2]Name:  Emerald
Race:  Custom Nord (Ningheim Based Preset)
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1.00
Weight:  85
Body Options:  Base UNP, CBBE, SeveNBase
Skin:  Fair Skin (Optimized & Uncompressed)
Armor:  Emerald Smoke Armor
Weapon:  Emerald Bow & Paralysis Arrows
[i]*Arrows are not playable by anyone but Emerald*[/i]
Location:  Drunken Huntsman - Whiterun

Class:  Combat Ranger
Style:  Missile

Levels with player.  Nord traits/bonuses.
Main Skills/bonuses:  Archery, Sneak, Restoration
Minor Skills/bonuses:  Light & Heavy Armor, One & Two Handed
Spells:  Healing Related, Custom Call of the Archer Shout

Tested with EFF
ENB Pictured:  Vividian[/size]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/s4mg0lbif/20170210085426_1.jpg[/img]


[youtube]FJZpYCKJ1b0[/youtube][youtube]1AWQDvKKS1M[/youtube]

[/url]Other Followers In The Series:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77257/?]Rolaryn Paradox[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80542/?]Amethyst[/url]

[/url]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/o6ukxfzbb/KnownIssues.png[/img]
Some ENBs may show slight skin discoloration between body and head

Armor may clip during some poses/animations

Call of the Archer Shout only works under certain conditions

Some testers' players were affected by the paralysis arrows,
therefore Emerald carries a Necklace & Ring which will allow you to learn resistance
if you are affected by the arrows.

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/iisvkakcn/20170203151749_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/8qh0n5uo7/Q&A.png[/img]
Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  What is the other armor pictured in some screenshots?
A:  Ashara Elven Archer w/ Ashara Paragon Jewelry

Q:  Will you release the Racemenu preset?
A:  Not without express permission from The World of RipX

Q:  SSE Conversion?
A:  When time allows & if permissions allow.

Q:  Console Port?
A:  No immediate plans due to console restrictions.

Q:  Where can I get the weapons show in some video clips?
A:  Emerald Smoke Armor (please see below for link)

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/zf8rl8d53/CreditsResources.png[/img]
